item.title: Facebook/TikTok Ad Editor (MUST Work In-house) - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I am looking for a full-time Facebook/TikTok ad video editor that can work in-house with my clients to edit our ads. We're looking for someone who has a lot of experience with creating ads that convert.

Here's what you'll be doing:

1. Creating/editing ads in a timely manner - Implementing strong hooks, scroll stoppers, animations, strong CTAs and so on.
2. Sourcing additional videos/assets to use if needed
3. Creating a few variations of ads for each product(s)  

Please note: We are looking for a full-time hire that can work in-house and want to pay a salary.  We can guarantee consistent work, pay and increased over time with performance.

If this is you be sure to include your portfolio.


Posted On: June 22, 2024 01:45 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Facebook, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing, Facebook Advertising, Instagram, TikTok Ad
Skills: Facebook, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing, Facebook Advertising, Instagram, TikTok Ad
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Professional Commercial Video Creator for High-Quality Teasers - Upwork
item.description:
Professional Commercial Video Creator for High-Quality Teasers

Job Summary:
Nivafy is seeking a highly skilled and creative Professional Commercial Video Creator to join our team for an ongoing project. We are gearing up for our beta launch and need visually stunning, cinematic quality teasers that capture the essence and excitement of our platform. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience in creating high-quality commercial videos, with a strong background in 3D modeling and special effects.

Responsibilities:
Create high-quality, visually stunning teasers for Nivafy's beta launch.
Utilize 3D modeling and special effects to enhance the visual appeal of the videos.
Collaborate with our marketing team to understand the key messages and themes to be conveyed.
Develop storyboards and concepts for approval before production.
Edit and refine videos to meet the highest standards of cinematic quality.
Ensure all content aligns with Nivafy's branding and marketing strategies.
Deliver completed videos within agreed timelines.
Requirements:
Proven experience as a commercial video creator, with a portfolio showcasing high-quality, cinematic work.
Proficiency in 3D modeling and special effects software.
Strong storytelling skills and creative vision.
Ability to work collaboratively and take feedback constructively.
Excellent attention to detail and commitment to delivering high-quality work.
Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines.


Posted On: June 22, 2024 01:44 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:MP4, Video Commercial, Videography, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: MP4, Video Commercial, Videography, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Expert Reels Video Editor Needed - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for a reels/short-form video expert who can use unique editing skills to bring my B-Roll content to life! I would like to start with 5-7 video edits for this project.

I am a marketing strategist, so the bulk of my content centers around marketing strategy, lead generation, messaging, community building, social media marketing, etc.

Here are some examples of the types of edits I am looking for:

Budget: $100

item.title: Create AI cinematic videos using Sora. - Upwork
item.description:
Create a short AI video using Sora. 1min to 3min. The subject of the video is Critical Thinking.
Create a 1 to 3 minute video on the subject of critical thinking. Show a Millennial that is standing in Central Park smiling. Camera zooms in to focus on their head and then the inner workings of their brain. Show the individual thinking about different experiences. In one experience he is playing with his 3 year old child, in another experience he is driving in his red Ferrari sports car and avoiding a child who darts into the street in front of his vehicle, in another experience he is sitting in a conference room, in a high rise office building, listening to a presentation by an attractive female colleague, in another experience he is walking into a plaza filled with protesters and police. At the end of the video the camera returns to the scene at beginning of the video with him smiling.

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 22, 2024 01:18 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:AI-Generated Video
Skills: AI-Generated Video
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: 3 x Short Video Snippet from Raw Footage + Adjusting Aspect Ratio of Existing Video - Upwork
item.description:
Hi,

We require an existing short video ratio used on our website homepage to be adjusted to social media specifications, that is, 9:16 and 1:1 aspect ratio. We then require three additional video shorts to be created, like the video in length and nature, provided in Part 1.

Part 1
For the attached video shorts, we need the ratios adjusted to match, 9:16 and 1:1 aspect ratio for use on Meta and Instagram use. We also need some suitable music added to the video. Can you please provide 3-5 suitable options for us to choose from so we can select from these before applying them to the video.

Part 2
We have raw video footage from our videographer and require 3 video shorts, like the video created in Part 1.
As we would like to focus on the ecommerce side/products/click n collect at our office we would like the following to depict as much as possible the customer service experience which is more relevant to our online clients, rather than our clinical or dental services which were also shot on the same day.
• Video 1 - Similar to video in Part 1, another version of handing over product to customer or alternatively an interaction with customer in reception. Perhaps, female customer this time.
• Video 2 – Outside, Customer being greeted, customer being assisted
• Video 3 - Customer interaction, product range, team
These need to be formatted for correct ratios for use on our website (as per the video provided in Part 1) and for Facebook and Instagram.

We need version with music and no music for each video.

They need to be about the same length, slightly longer if needed than the video provided in Part 1 above.

We would like the first drafts to be completed by 26th June 9am AEDST and final files/project completed by 7th July.

Our budget is $70 USD for the entire project.


Budget: $70
Posted On: June 22, 2024 01:14 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Youtube Video music mix editing + video rendering (and Youtube Channel Management) - Upwork
item.description:
Main Goal: I will find, purchase, and provide visual footage + music to use. We will work together to color grade, edit, and render long music mix videos (potentially up to 1 hr+).

I am looking for someone who can always work on improving the editing of the video and maintain a very high quality standard. Eventually get to a level of managing the youtube channel and potentially other members of a team also doing youtube.

This is a general example to get idea, but i think there is very poorly done and can be much better: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B-ygIXfIkFo&t=35s

Experience Requirements
1. editing + rendering experience
2. color-grading experience for videos specifically nature related
3. image editing + creation (thumbnail editing)
4. past youtube channel experience (understanding of good vs bad thumbnails, titles seo, etc)

*English speaking is required (For cases if we do video calls)


As a test you can try editing / rendering one 20 minute video with provided details, music, and footage for $20.

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 22, 2024 01:07 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Color Grading, Video Editing, YouTube, YouTube Thumbnail
Skills: Color Grading, Video Editing, YouTube, YouTube Thumbnail
Country: United States
click to apply
